nodes.bodyText:
SELECT子句暂不支持号简写；暂不支持使用内置的分布式主键生成器
或者
SELECT子句暂不支持号简写及使用内置的分布式主键生成器
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -117,7 +119,8 @@ SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE to_date(create_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = '2019-01-01';
 | SQL                                                                                        | 不支持原因                  |
 | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------- |
 | INSERT INTO tbl_name (col1, col2, ...) VALUES(1+2, ?, ...)                                 | VALUES语句不支持运算表达式   |
-| INSERT INTO tbl_name (col1, col2, ...) SELECT col1, col2, ... FROM tbl_name WHERE col3 = ? | INSERT .. SELECT           |
+| INSERT INTO tbl_name (col1, col2, ...) SELECT * FROM tbl_name WHERE col3 = ?               | SELECT子句暂不支持*号简写，暂不支持使用内置的分布式主键生成器 |

nodes.bodyText: How about these statements? That will read clear, don't you think?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -117,7 +119,8 @@ SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE to_date(create_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = '2019-01-01';
 | SQL                                                                                        | 不支持原因                  |
 | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | -------------------------- |
 | INSERT INTO tbl_name (col1, col2, ...) VALUES(1+2, ?, ...)                                 | VALUES语句不支持运算表达式   |
-| INSERT INTO tbl_name (col1, col2, ...) SELECT col1, col2, ... FROM tbl_name WHERE col3 = ? | INSERT .. SELECT           |
+| INSERT INTO tbl_name (col1, col2, ...) SELECT * FROM tbl_name WHERE col3 = ?               | SELECT子句暂不支持*号简写，暂不支持使用内置的分布式主键生成器 |

nodes.bodyText: Maybe SELECT子句暂不支持使用*号简写及内置的分布式主键生成器 is better. 😂
